features.secureRegistrationDesc: Registration system with email validation and secure passwords with strength indicator.
features.emailVerificationDesc: Complete email verification flow with secure tokens and automatic resending.
features.magicLinkDesc: Passwordless login through secure link sent by email.
features.passwordRecoveryDesc: Secure recovery process with temporary links and token validation.
features.twoFactorAuthDesc: Two-step verification via OTP code sent by email for enhanced security.
features.sessionManagementDesc: JWT sessions with configurable expiration and automatic route protection.
features.advancedProtectionDesc: Rate limiting, account lockout for failed attempts, and access auditing.
features.cookieManagementDesc: Consent banner with customizable preferences: necessary, analytics, and functional cookies.
